00061 #include "sqr.h"

00065 using namespace std;

00067 //=======================================================================
00068 //
00069 // fitness function: Ackley's function
00070 //
00071 double ackley( const vector< double >& x )
00072 {
00073     const double A = 20.;
00074     const double B = 0.2;
00075     const double C = Pi2;
00076 
00077     unsigned i, n;
00078     double   a, b;
00079 
00080     for( a = b = 0., i = 0, n = x.size( ); i < n; ++i ) {
00081         a += x[ i ] * x[ i ];
00082         b += cos( C * x[ i ] );
00083     }
00084 
00085     return -A * exp( -B * sqrt( a / n ) ) - exp( b / n ) + A + E;
00086 }

00089 //=======================================================================
00090 //
00091 // 
00092 //
00093 class ES : public EvoAlg
00094 {
00095   public:
00096     ES( unsigned mu,
00097         unsigned lambda,
00098         unsigned dimension,
00099         unsigned nsigma,
00100         double   min,
00101         double   max,
00102         double   sigma,
00103         bool     plus,
00104         const string& saveFile = "" )
00105       : EvoAlg( mu,     Individual( ChromosomeT< double >( dimension ),
00106                                     ChromosomeT< double >( nsigma    ) ),
00107                 lambda, Individual( ChromosomeT< double >( dimension ),
00108                                     ChromosomeT< double >( nsigma    ) ),
00109                 saveFile )
00110     {
00111         minInit      = min;
00112         maxInit      = max;
00113         sigmaInit    = sigma;
00114         plusStrategy = plus;
00115 
00116         //
00117         // selection parameters (number of elitists)
00118         //
00119         numElitists = plusStrategy ? parents.size( ) : 0;
00120 
00121         //
00122         // standard deviations for mutation of sigma
00123         //
00124         tau0 = 1. / sqrt( 2. * parents[ 0 ][ 0 ].size( ) );
00125         tau1 = 1. / sqrt( 2. * sqrt( ( double )parents[ 0 ][ 0 ].size( ) ) );
00126 
00127         if( generation == 0 )   // no lock file loaded (, probably)
00128             initialize( );
00129     }
00130 
00131     void initialize( )
00132     {
00133         //
00134         // initialize parent population
00135         //
00136         for( unsigned i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i ) {
00137             dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >
00138                 ( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ).initialize( minInit,   maxInit   );
00139             dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >
00140                 ( parents[ i ][ 1 ] ).initialize( sigmaInit, sigmaInit );
00141         }
00142 
00143         //
00144         // evaluate parents (only needed for elitist strategy)
00145         //
00146         if( plusStrategy ) {
00147             for( unsigned i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i )
00148                 parents[ i ].setFitness( ackley(
00149                     dynamic_cast< vector< double >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00150         }
00151     }
00152 
00153     void generate( )
00154     {
00155         //
00156         // generate new offsprings
00157         //
00158         for( unsigned i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i ) {
00159             //
00160             // select two random parents
00161             //
00162             Individual& mom = parents.random( );
00163             Individual& dad = parents.random( );
00164 
00165             //
00166             // define temporary references for convenience
00167             //
00168             ChromosomeT< double >& objvar =
00169                 dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] );
00170             ChromosomeT< double >& sigma  =
00171                 dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 1 ] );
00172 
00173             //
00174             // recombine object variables discrete, step sizes intermediate
00175             //
00176             objvar.recombineDiscrete       ( mom[ 0 ], dad[ 0 ] );
00177             sigma .recombineGenIntermediate( mom[ 1 ], dad[ 1 ] );
00178 
00179             //
00180             // mutate object variables normal distributed,
00181             // step sizes log normal distributed
00182             //
00183             sigma .mutateLogNormal( tau0,  tau1 );
00184             objvar.mutateNormal   ( sigma, true );
00185         }
00186     }
00187 
00188     void evaluate( )
00189     {
00190         //
00191         // evaluate objective function (parameters in chromosome #0)
00192         //
00193         for( unsigned i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i )
00194             offsprings[ i ].setFitness( ackley(
00195                 dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >
00196                     ( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00197     }
00198 
00199     void select( )
00200     {
00201         //
00202         // select (mu,lambda) or (mu+lambda)
00203         //
00204         parents.selectMuLambda( offsprings, numElitists );
00205     }
00206 
00207     void display( )
00208     {
00209         //
00210         // print out best value found so far
00211         //
00212         cout << generation << "\tbest value = "
00213              << parents.best( ).fitnessValue( ) << endl;
00214     }
00215 
00216   private:
00217     double   minInit;
00218     double   maxInit;
00219     double   sigmaInit;
00220     bool     plusStrategy;
00221 
00222     unsigned numElitists;
00223     double   tau0;
00224     double   tau1;
00225 };

00228 //=======================================================================
00229 //
00230 // main program
00231 //
00232 int main( int argc, char **argv )
00233 {
00234     //
00235     // constants
00236     //
00237     const unsigned Mu           = 15;
00238     const unsigned Lambda       = 100;
00239     const unsigned Dimension    = 30;
00240     const unsigned NSigma       = 1;
00241     const unsigned Iterations   = 500;
00242     const unsigned Interval     = 10;
00243 
00244     const double   MinInit      = -3;
00245     const double   MaxInit      = +15;
00246     const double   SigmaInit    = 3;
00247 
00248     const bool     PlusStrategy = false;
00249 
00250     const string   SaveFile     = "save.state";
00251 
00252     ES es( Mu, Lambda, Dimension, NSigma,
00253            MinInit, MaxInit, SigmaInit, PlusStrategy, SaveFile );
00254 
00255     es.setMaxGeneration( Iterations );
00256     es.setDisplayInterval ( Interval );
00257     es.setMinimize     ( );
00258 
00259     //
00260     // iterate
00261     //
00262     while( ! es.terminated( ) )
00263         es.iterate( );
00264 
00265     return 0;
00266 }
